question:
Hindu Mahasabha was not able to represent the Hindus in a fashion Muslim league was able to represent Muslims. What was / were the reason(s)?
1. Majority of the politically minded Hindus were in Congress
2. The Hindu Mahasabha attacked the Congress and labelled it as anti-Hindu
3. Hindu Mahasabha lacked the warring activists
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Hindu Mahasabha was founded by Madan Mohan Malaviya in 1915 as organization. In the year 1933 it became a political party. The presence of Hindu community was very less with compare to the presence of Muslims in the Muslim league because majority of the politically minded Hindus were in the Indian National Congress. Only First statement is correct.
